update tb_order set
container_number1 = #{containerNumber1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
container_number2 = #{containerNumber2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
take_cargo_place_id = #{takeCargoPlaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
take_carogo_place_name = #{takeCarogoPlaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
take_cargo_site_id = #{takeCargoSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
take_cargo_site_name = #{takeCargoSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_dispatch_id = #{userDispatchId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_dispatch_name = #{userDispatchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date =now(), status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_order set deletor_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_time = now(), delete_reason = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_cancel = #{isCancel,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_order set send_tare = #{sendTare,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, send_gross = #{sendGross,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
container_one_send_net = #{containerOneSendNet,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
container_two_send_net = #{containerTwoSendNet,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
test_indicators = #{testIndicators,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date =now(), take_delivery_date = now(), order_img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update tb_order set status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, update_date =now() where id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_order set status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, distribution_cargo_place = #{distributionCargoPlace,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, distribution_cargo_site = #{distributionCargoSite,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, distribution_cargo_place_id = #{distributionCargoPlaceId,jdbcType = INTEGER}, distribution_cargo_site_id = #{distributionCargoSiteId,jdbcType = INTEGER}, update_date =now() where id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_order set take_cargo_place_id = #{takeCargoPlaceId,jdbcType = INTEGER}, take_carogo_place_name = #{takeCarogoPlaceName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, take_cargo_site_id = #{takeCargoSiteId,jdbcType = INTEGER}, take_cargo_site_name = #{takeCargoSiteName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} where id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: select id,exception_reoport_id exceptionReoportId,exception_reoport_name exceptionReoportName,exception_time exceptionTime, exception_reoport_reason exceptionReoportReason from tb_order where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id,jdbcType = INTEGER}

select count(*) from tb_order o,tb_project p,tb_user_branch_group g where o.delete_flag = 0 and o.is_cancel = 0 and o.status in ('6','7') and o.project_id = p.id and p.delete_flag = 0 and p.branch_group_id = g.branch_group_id and year(o.receipter_date) = year(now()) and month(o.receipter_date) = month(now()) and g.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType = INTEGER}

select count(*) from tb_order o,tb_project p,tb_user_branch_group g where o.delete_flag = 0 and o.is_cancel = 0 and o.status in ('6','7') and o.project_id = p.id and p.delete_flag = 0 and p.branch_group_id = g.branch_group_id and year(o.receipter_date) = year(now()) and month(o.receipter_date) = month(now()) and day(o.receipter_date) = day(now()) and g.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType = INTEGER}

select count(*) from tb_order o,tb_project p,tb_user_branch_group g where o.delete_flag = 0 and o.is_cancel = 0 and o.status in (#{status,jdbcType = VARCHAR}) and o.project_id = p.id and p.delete_flag = 0 and p.branch_group_id = g.branch_group_id and g.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType = INTEGER}

SELECT DISTINCT o.id id,o.order_code orderCode,o.project_id projectId,o.project_code projectCode,o.project_type projectType,o.transport_type transportType,o.driver_id driverId,o.creator_id creatorId,o.create_date createDate,o.update_date updateDate,o.user_dispatch_id userDispatchId,o.user_dispatch_name userDispatchName,o.project_distribution_id projectDistributionId,o.type type,o.status status,o.exception_status exceptionStatus,o.exception_id exceptionId,o.exception_reoport_id exceptionReoportId,o.exception_reoport_name exceptionReoportName,o.exception_time exceptionTime,o.exception_reoport_reason exceptionReoportReason,o.remark remark,o.step_select_code stepSelectCode,o.step_select stepSelect,o.branch_group_name branchGroupName,o.send_company_id sendCompanyId,o.send_company sendCompany,o.pickup_place pickupPlace,o.pickup_place_address pickupPlaceAddress,o.receipt_company_id receiptCompanyId,o.receipt_company receiptCompany,o.arrive_place arrivePlace,o.arrive_address arriveAddress,o.arrive_freight_yrad arriveFreightYrad,o.arrive_freight_site arriveFreightSite,o.carrier_vehicle_id carrierVehicleId,o.carrier_vehicle_name carrierVehicleName,o.car_plate_number carPlateNumber,o.car_type carType,o.driver_name driverName,o.driver_phone driverPhone,o.container_number1_id containerNumber1Id,o.container_number1 containerNumber1,o.container_number2_id containerNumber2Id,o.container_number2 containerNumber2,o.cargo_name cargoName,o.specifications specifications,o.deduction_rate deductionRate,o.short_barge_cost shortBargeCost,o.subsidy subsidy,o.deduction_price deductionPrice,o.send_tare sendTare,o.send_gross sendGross,o.container_one_send_net containerOneSendNet,o.container_two_send_net containerTwoSendNet,o.test_indicators testIndicators,o.order_img orderImg,o.distribution_cargo_place distributionCargoPlace,o.distribution_cargo_site distributionCargoSite,o.receipt_tare receiptTare,o.receipt_gross receiptGross,o.container_one_receipt_net containerOneReceiptNet,o.container_two_receipt_net containerTwoReceiptNet,o.receipt_test_indicators receiptTestIndicators,o.arrivered_img arriveredImg,o.edit_date editDate,o.piece_number pieceNumber,o.valuation_unit_type valuationUnitType,o.carTeam_id carteamId,o.place_now_id placeNowId,o.order_origin orderOrigin,o.deletor_id deletorId,o.delete_name deleteName,o.delete_time deleteTime,o.delete_reason deleteReason,o.delete_flag deleteFlag,o.is_cancel isCancel,o.cancel_reason cancelReason,o.cancel_reason_detail cancelReasonDetail,o.cancel_date cancelDate,o.receipter_date receipterDate,o.take_cargo_place_id takeCargoPlaceId,o.take_carogo_place_name takeCarogoPlaceName,o.take_cargo_site_id takeCargoSiteId,o.take_cargo_site_name takeCargoSiteName,o.take_delivery_date takeDeliveryDate,o.distribution_cargo_place_id distributionCargoPlaceId,o.distribution_cargo_site_id distributionCargoSiteId ,if(o.container_one_send_net='','-',IFNULL(o.container_one_send_net,0)+IFNULL(o.container_two_send_net,0)) containerSendNet ,IFNULL(case when step_select_code=0 then p.pick_up_price when step_select_code=1 then p.arrive_price else p.transport_price end,0) entrustUnitprice ,IFNULL(case when step_select_code=0 then p.pick_up_price when step_select_code=1 then p.arrive_price else p.transport_price end,0)*(IFNULL(o.container_one_send_net,0)+IFNULL(o.container_two_send_net,0)) prodectMoney ,round(IFNULL(case when step_select_code=0 then p.pick_up_price when step_select_code=1 then p.arrive_price else p.transport_price end,0)*(IFNULL(o.container_one_send_net,0)+IFNULL(o.container_two_send_net,0))*IFNULL(c.tax_rate,0)/100,2) shouldTaxMoney FROM tb_order o left join tb_project p on p.id=o.project_id left join tb_customer_checking_conf c on c.project_id=o.project_id left join tb_branch_group_link y on o.id=y.row_id and y.tab_name='tb_order' WHERE (o.`status` IN (6, 7) or (o.`status`=5 and receipter_date!='')) and y.sys_org_code like CONCAT(#{map.sysOrgCode},'%') and o.delete_flag = 0 and o.is_cancel = 0 and o.receipter_date is not null
and o.receipter_date >= str_to_date( #{map.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and o.receipter_date <= DATE_SUB(str_to_date( #{map.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL -1 DAY) and o.step_select_code = #{map.orderType} and o.project_id = #{map.projectId} and c.cust_check_con_id = #{map.custCheckConId} and o.checkcust_flag=0
and not exists (select cpo.order_id from tb_customer_pack_order cpo where cpo.order_id = o.id and cpo.delete_flag = 0)

SELECT DISTINCT o.id id,o.order_code orderCode,o.project_id projectId,o.project_code projectCode,o.project_type projectType,o.transport_type transportType,o.driver_id driverId,o.creator_id creatorId,o.create_date createDate,o.update_date updateDate,o.user_dispatch_id userDispatchId,o.user_dispatch_name userDispatchName,o.project_distribution_id projectDistributionId,o.type type,o.status status,o.exception_status exceptionStatus,o.exception_id exceptionId,o.exception_reoport_id exceptionReoportId,o.exception_reoport_name exceptionReoportName,o.exception_time exceptionTime,o.exception_reoport_reason exceptionReoportReason,o.remark remark,o.step_select_code stepSelectCode,o.step_select stepSelect,o.branch_group_name branchGroupName,o.send_company_id sendCompanyId,o.send_company sendCompany,o.pickup_place pickupPlace,o.pickup_place_address pickupPlaceAddress,o.receipt_company_id receiptCompanyId,o.receipt_company receiptCompany,o.arrive_place arrivePlace,o.arrive_address arriveAddress,o.arrive_freight_yrad arriveFreightYrad,o.arrive_freight_site arriveFreightSite,o.carrier_vehicle_id carrierVehicleId,o.carrier_vehicle_name carrierVehicleName,o.car_plate_number carPlateNumber,o.car_type carType,o.driver_name driverName,o.driver_phone driverPhone,o.container_number1_id containerNumber1Id,o.container_number1 containerNumber1,o.container_number2_id containerNumber2Id,o.container_number2 containerNumber2,o.cargo_name cargoName,o.specifications specifications,o.deduction_rate deductionRate,o.short_barge_cost shortBargeCost,o.subsidy subsidy,o.deduction_price deductionPrice,o.send_tare sendTare,o.send_gross sendGross,o.container_one_send_net containerOneSendNet,o.container_two_send_net containerTwoSendNet,o.test_indicators testIndicators,o.order_img orderImg,o.distribution_cargo_place distributionCargoPlace,o.distribution_cargo_site distributionCargoSite,o.receipt_tare receiptTare,o.receipt_gross receiptGross,o.container_one_receipt_net containerOneReceiptNet,o.container_two_receipt_net containerTwoReceiptNet,o.receipt_test_indicators receiptTestIndicators,o.arrivered_img arriveredImg,o.edit_date editDate,o.piece_number pieceNumber,o.valuation_unit_type valuationUnitType,o.carTeam_id carteamId,o.place_now_id placeNowId,o.order_origin orderOrigin,o.deletor_id deletorId,o.delete_name deleteName,o.delete_time deleteTime,o.delete_reason deleteReason,o.delete_flag deleteFlag,o.is_cancel isCancel,o.cancel_reason cancelReason,o.cancel_reason_detail cancelReasonDetail,o.cancel_date cancelDate,o.receipter_date receipterDate,o.take_cargo_place_id takeCargoPlaceId,o.take_carogo_place_name takeCarogoPlaceName,o.take_cargo_site_id takeCargoSiteId,o.take_cargo_site_name takeCargoSiteName,o.take_delivery_date takeDeliveryDate,o.distribution_cargo_place_id distributionCargoPlaceId,o.distribution_cargo_site_id distributionCargoSiteId ,if(o.container_one_send_net='','-',IFNULL(o.container_one_send_net,0)+IFNULL(o.container_two_send_net,0)) containerSendNet ,IFNULL(case when step_select_code=0 then p.pick_up_price when step_select_code=1 then p.arrive_price else p.transport_price end,0) entrustUnitprice ,IFNULL(case when step_select_code=0 then p.pick_up_price when step_select_code=1 then p.arrive_price else p.transport_price end,0)*(IFNULL(o.container_one_send_net,0)+IFNULL(o.container_two_send_net,0)) prodectMoney ,round(IFNULL(case when step_select_code=0 then p.pick_up_price when step_select_code=1 then p.arrive_price else p.transport_price end,0)*(IFNULL(o.container_one_send_net,0)+IFNULL(o.container_two_send_net,0))*IFNULL(c.tax_rate,0)/100,2) shouldTaxMoney FROM tb_order o left join tb_project p on p.id=o.project_id left join tb_customer_checking_conf c on c.project_id=o.project_id left join tb_branch_group_link y on o.id=y.row_id and y.tab_name='tb_order' WHERE (o.`status` IN (6, 7) or (o.`status`=5 and receipter_date!='')) and y.sys_org_code like CONCAT(#{map.sysOrgCode},'%') and o.delete_flag = 0 and o.is_cancel = 0 and c.cust_check_con_id = #{map.custCheckConId} and o.checkcust_flag=0 and exists (select cpo.order_id from tb_customer_pack_order cpo where cpo.delete_flag = 0 and cpo.order_id = o.id and cpo.cust_pack_id = #{map.custPackId})

SELECT o.id orderId, o.project_code projectCode, o.order_code orderCode, o.car_plate_number carPlateNumber, o.send_tare sendTare, o.send_gross sendGross, o.project_type projectType, case o.project_type when 0 then (o.container_one_send_net+o.container_two_send_net) when 1 then o.container_one_send_net end containerSendNet, o.order_origin orderOrigin, o.create_date createDate, o.pickup_place pickupPlace, o.take_delivery_date takeDeliveryDate, o.arrive_place arrivePlace, o.receipter_date receipterDate, o.user_dispatch_id userDispatchId, su.`name` userDispatchName FROM tb_order o, tb_system_user su WHERE step_select_code = 0 AND delete_flag = 0 AND is_cancel = 0 AND o.user_dispatch_id = su.id AND o.step_select_code = 0 ORDER BY orderId
mapper.update: update tb_login_user set order_status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_status from tb_login_user where id = #{driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update tb_order set status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, update_date =now() where id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(A.id) num from tb_order A left join tb_branch_group_link y on A.id=y.row_id where A.branch_id in
#{item}
and y.tab_name='tb_order' and y.sys_org_code like CONCAT(#{sysOrgCode},'%') and A.delete_flag = 0 and A.exception_status = 0 and A.is_cancel = 0
and A.status in (6,7) and (DATE_FORMAT(A.edit_date,'%Y%m%d')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d'))
and A.status in (6,7) and (DATE_FORMAT(A.edit_date,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m'))
and A.status in (3,4,5) and (DATE_FORMAT(A.update_date,'%Y%m%d')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d'))
select car_team_id from tb_login_user where id = #{driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
